description: Get the summary of the latest earnings call for a given company and how it has changed various previous earnings calls.
example: Tell me the highlights of Tesla's earnings.Write me an investment thesis for Saudi Aramco.Which product has the highest chance of success?Identify the key drivers behind each business segment.
thought: These questions may require context from earnings. get_earnings_summary should be able to provide sufficient context to provide an answer.

description: Get a list of questions about the company based on earnings to ask management or investor relations.
example: What questions should I ask Tesla's management?
thought: get_earnings_questions will provide a list of questions to ask management.

description: Get a summary of GIC internal analysts' views for each quarter and how the latest quarter's views have changed from previous quarters for a given company.
example: What do our analysts think about Tesla?Why is Tesla's stock so overvalued?
thought: These questions are related to our internal analyst views about a company. get_earnings_questions should be able to provide sufficient context to provide an answer.

description: Get all the intrinsic values (IVs) and recommendations of GIC internal analysts' for a given company
example: What are the IVs for Tesla?What are our analysts' intrinsic values for Tesla?What are our analysts' IV for Tesla?Do our analysts recommend buying Tesla?
thought: These questions are related to the intrinsic values (IVs) and recommendations from our internal analyst about a company. get_rms_iv should be able to provide sufficient context to provide an answer.

description: Performas a basic chat that does not require any information from any of the tools above.
thought: These questions are not related to a company's earnings or views from our internal analysts. general_chat should be able to provide the answer.
